archimate:Node.name: [NCSA Kub] NCSA Kubernetes Worker Nodes Event Distribution Upgrade (Logical Node)
archimate:Node.documentation: Kubernetes ITC provides for an Elastic capability for services. Unused Kubernetes capacity can be used by the condor based batch system. Here it is thought that the complete kafaka system, which includes the LSST-provided mini Broker and and service access points for community brokers, and community visible health and status endpoint, and an endpoint for loading the offline alert database are all hosted via kubernetes.
